name: PH_6_4_Data_and_Documentation_from_External_Clinical_Sources
title: PH.6.4 Data and Documentation from External Clinical Sources (Function)
description: The system should capture, index, and store documentation related to the encounter.
purpose:
Most encounters generate documentation that can be captured in the PHR-S. Additional supporting data such as diagnostic reports or consultations may be included. A prolonged hospitalization encounter may encompass numerous structured or unstructured documents.

Example(s): The system should capture, index, and store encounter information, including the encounter document or summary, laboratory results, radiographic images, PACS, EKG, and scanned documents.

statement.label: PH.6.4#01
statement.requirement: IF information is received through any electronic interface or is electronically referenced, THEN the system SHALL present it upon request, according to organizational policy and/or jurisdictional law.

statement.label: PH.6.4#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to capture externally-sourced electronic clinical documentation including original, updates and addenda, according to organizational policy and/or jurisdictional law.

statement.label: PH.6.4#03
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to capture and maintain externally-sourced electronic clinical documentation and annotations with structured content including problems, diagnoses, office visit, phone communication, e-mail consultations and laboratory results.

statement.label: PH.6.4#04
statement.requirement: IF externally-sourced electronic clinical documentation is captured from encounters with providers, THEN the system SHALL provide the ability to present that documentation to the PHR Account Holder.

statement.label: PH.6.4#05
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to render notes based on filters, search, or sort criteria.

statement.label: PH.6.4#06
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to exchange data using documentation templates.
